author: andschwa
body: This resolves #925 and brings us up-to-date with Source Depot. Corresponds to 84837459913bb00660964d19ea07f5e0c7b4b442 in psl-monad. /cc @vors --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/927)
